exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap The term "genus m" has type "Z" while it is expected to have type "nat".
The reference H was not found in the current environment.
The reference H was not found in the current environment.
In environment m : fmap Hcontra : planar m Unable to unify "planar m" with "Decidable.decidable False".

original: intros m. destruct (Nat.eq_dec (genus m) 0) as [H | H]. - left. apply H. - right. intro Hcontra. apply H. apply Hcontra.
